mdRecord.dcterms:description: ... conceived by the architects John Howells and Raymond Hood in 1924 and built for the American Radiator Company. [It was designed by Hood and Andre Fouilhoux.] The building's structural form is based on Eliel Saarinen's unbuilt competition entry for the Tribune Tower, augmented with a strong use of color. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Radiator_Building [work]
